text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: Raskolnikov, Razumihin, tense atmosphere>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: Why doesn’t Razumihin see anything?  
Raskolnikov: Is Porfiry teasing me?  

---

<setup: Raskolnikov, anxious thoughts, paranoia>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: They must know about the flat!  
Raskolnikov: Am I being watched?  

---

<setup: Porfiry enters, jovial yet suspicious>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Porfiry: Your party yesterday has me puzzled.  
Raskolnikov: What did I even come for?

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov is consumed by paranoia and anxiety about being scrutinized by Porfiry and others regarding his actions.
